name: Dreamland Theater (Vertical Slice)
description:
Dreamland Theater is a place that gathers children and allows them to taste how it is be on the stage, to be part of a play. Recently, the theater was a center of attention because of repeating mysterious incidents. A child actor disappearing hours before the play with no tracks left, some props turn into actual weapons while some disappear with no explanation. Police is searching for clues with no result, while some blamed it on superstition.

One of actors was leaving the theater later then usual, went down the stairs, slipped and realized that he finds himself in parts of the theater he can't remember. Now he tries to escape the building while learning the truth behind recent accidents. Is theater haunted or is everything he experiences a staged play?

Controls:

  • [W, S, A, D] - Movement
  • [Mouse] - Look around
  • [E] - Interaction
  • [Shift] - Sprint
  • [Ctrl] - "Become Invisible"

Goal:  Find a way to open exit door and fall off the map.
